question: CC18_308a
text: Job approval -- President Trump

question: CC18_308b
text: Job approval -- The U.S. Congress

question: CC18_308c
text: Job approval -- The U.S. Supreme Court

question: CC18_320a
text: Gun Control -- Background checks for all sales, including at gun shows and over the Internet

question: CC18_320c
text: Gun Control -- Ban assault rifles

question: CC18_320d
text: Gun Control -- Make it easier for people to obtain a concealed-carry gun permit

question: CC18_321a
text: Abortion -- Always allow a woman to obtain an abortion as a matter of choice

question: CC18_321b
text: Abortion -- Permit abortion ONLY in case of rape, incest or when the woman's life is in danger

question: CC18_321c
text: Abortion -- Ban abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy

question: CC18_321d
text: Abortion -- Allow employers to decline coverage of abortions in insurance plans

question: CC18_321e
text: Abortion -- Prohibit the expenditure of funds authorized or appropriated by federal law for any abortion.

question: CC18_321f
text: Abortion -- Make abortions illegal in all circumstances

question: CC18_322a
text: Immigration -- Increase spending on border security by $25 billion, including building a wall between the U.S. and Mexico.

question: CC18_322b
text: Immigration -- Provide legal status to children of immigrants who are already in the United States and were brought to the United States by their parents. Provide these children the option of citizenship in 10 years if they meet citizenship requirements an

question: CC18_322c_new
text: Immigration -- Reduce legal immigration by eliminating the visa lottery and ending family-based migration.

question: CC18_322d_new
text: Immigration -- Grant legal status to DACA children, spend $25 billion to build the border wall, and reduce legal immigration by eliminating the visa lottery and ending family-based migration.

question: CC18_322c
text: Immigration -- Withhold federal funds from any local police department that does not report to the federal government anyone they identify as an illegal immigrant.

question: CC18_322f
text: Immigration -- Send to prison any person who has been deported from the United States and reenters the United States.

question: CC18_325a
text: Taxes -- Cut the Corporate Income Tax rate from 39 percent to 21 percent.

question: CC18_325b
text: Taxes -- Reduce the mortgage interest deduction.  Allow people to deduct the interest on no more than $500,000 of mortgage debt. The previous limit was $1 million.

question: CC18_325c
text: Taxes -- Limit the amount of state and local taxes that can be deducted to $10,000 (previously there was no limit).

question: CC18_325d
text: Taxes -- Increase the standard deduction on federal income taxes from $12,000 to $25,000.

question: CC18_325e_new
text: Taxes -- Reduce the income tax rate for households earning less than $500,000 by 3%

question: CC18_325f_new
text: Taxes -- Reduce the income tax rate for households earning more than $500,000 by 3 percent (from 40 to 37 percent).

question: CC18_326
text: Tax Bill

question: CC18_327a
text: Health Care -- Provide Medicare for all Americans.

question: CC18_327c
text: Health Care -- Repeal the entire Affordable Care Act.

question: CC18_327d
text: Health Care -- Repeal only the part of the Affordable Care Act that requires that most individuals have health insurance and that larger employers cover their employees

question: CC18_327e
text: Health Care -- Partially repeal the Affordable Care Act.  This would (1) repeal individual and employer mandates, (2) cut Medicaid payments by 25 percent, and (3) reduce taxes on expensive health plans, known as Cadillac health plans.

question: CC18_328b
text: Roll Call Votes -- Appoint Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court of the United States.

question: CC18_328d
text: Roll Call Votes -- Require that the President get approval from Congress to ease any existing sanctions on Russia.

question: CC18_328e
text: Roll Call Votes -- Impose sanctions on countries and firms doing business with North Korea. Increase President's authority to impose sanctions if North Korea violates U.N. Security Council resolutions regarding that country.

question: CC18_328f
text: Roll Call Votes -- Appoint Brett Kavanaugh to the Supreme Court of the United States.

question: CC18_331a
text: Trade policy -- $50 billion worth of tariffs on goods imported from China

question: CC18_331b
text: Trade policy -- 25% tariffs on imported steel and 10% on imported aluminum, EXCEPT from Canada, Europe and Mexico.

question: CC18_331c
text: Trade policy -- 25% tariffs on imported steel and 10% on imported aluminum, INCLUDING from Canada, Europe and Mexico.

question: CC18_332a
text: Executive Orders -- Recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel and move the U.S. embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem.

question: CC18_332b
text: Executive Orders -- Allow the construction of the Keystone XL pipeline.

question: CC18_332c
text: Executive Orders -- Withdraw the United States from the Paris Climate Agreement.

question: CC18_332e
text: Executive Orders -- Withdraw the United States from the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade agreement, a free trade agreement that included the U.S., Japan, Australia, Vietnam, Canada, Chile, others.
